name: Cilantro Salsa With Mint
keywords: basil, cilantro, lime, dairy-free, gluten-free, low cholesterol, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup plus 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil
Juice of 1 or 2 limes, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop cilantro, jalapeno, basil, mint and garlic. Mix.
Stir in oil, lime juice, salt and 1/4 cup water. Adjust salt and lime juice to taste. Use as a sauce for grilled fish or vegetables, or on tomatoes.
